resources.string: Show Me some likes by tapping the \'LIKE\' Button.
This Application Helps in Downloading videos from Twitter or YouTube Applications. Once you have clicked the share button and selected----- Easy-Down, Just Confirm Your Notifications

Copy the tweet url of the tweet containing the video or animated gif. Then paste it into the tweet url box. Enter the name you want it stored with (optional). Then tap the \'Download\' button. Enjoy!!!

Select \'Share Tweet viaâ€¦\' option from the (specific) tweet options. Then select TwittaSave app from the list of apps (The tweet url is automatically inserted into the tweet url box). Enter the name you want it stored with (optional). Then tap the \'Download\' button. Enjoy!!!

Enable AutoListen using the Switch below the Download Button. From the Twitter app, simply select \'Copy link to tweet\' option from the tweet containing the video or gif. TwittaSave automatically handles the download of the video or animated gif.
I grab YouTube and Twitter Videos Only but Very Soon I will Grab Facebook Too
Copy Links for Automatic Downloads By----- Easy-Down. It will Happen in Background. Check notifications Thank You..!!
If you are on Twitter or Youtube Share video with----- Easy-Down to Download. Check Notifications After
